timeline.bodyText: I am not really sure if we want this behavior. It might be a bit confusing. Image a rich tree group structure and some user who has been given a GROUPADMIN of the root group. In GUI, he will be shown, that he is an admin of something like 1000 groups and he will not be able to distinguish between the root group and subgroups.
